title.en: check and expand use in tree and relevance with dataSet

description.zh: expand 和 check 可以配合dataSet的使用方法
description.en:
expand ,check diffrent using with dataSet

DataSet.

description.zh: Tree selectable 属性设置为 false，checkable 为 true 时可实现点击整个节点触发 onCheck 事件及 DataSet select 相关事件。
description.en: The Tree `selectable` property is set to `false`, and when `checkable` is `true`, the `onCheck` event and DataSet `select` related events can be triggered by clicking the entire node.

description.zh: 节点之间带连接线的树，常用于文件目录结构展示。使用 showLine 开启，可以用 switcherIcon 修改默认图标。
description.en: A tree with connecting lines between nodes is often used for file directory structure display. Use showLine to open, you can use switcherIcon to modify the default icon.

description.zh: 通过配置draggable属性实现Tree组件整体拖拽、单个树节点拖拽以及拖拽图标的控制。
description.en: By configuring the dragable property, the Tree component as a whole is dragged, a single tree node is dragged, and the drag icon is controlled.

description.zh: 不关联数据源基本使用，最简单的用法，展示可勾选，可选中，禁用，默认展开等功能。
description.en: The most basic usage, tell you how to use checkable, selectable, disabled, defaultExpandKeys, and etc.

description.zh: 不关联数据源，受控操作示例
可以针对不同节点采用样式覆盖的方式定制图标。
description.en: You can customize icons for different nodes by styles override.

description.zh: 内置的目录树，`multiple` 模式支持 `ctrl(Windows)` / `command(Mac)` 复选。
使用 `height` 属性则切换为虚拟滚动。
